thread.title: 11 Remarkable Crosswords for New Solvers - The New York Times
thread.title_full: 11 Remarkable Crosswords for New Solvers - The New York Times

title: 11 Remarkable Crosswords for New Solvers - The New York Times
text:
Crosswords & Games 11 Remarkable Crosswords for New Solvers Ready to conquer The New York Times Crossword? Here's a sampling — hand-picked by Will Shortz — to get you started. FEB. 14, 2017 Monday, Sept. 9, 2002 
Every great themed crossword is based on an original idea. The theme of this one (as shown in 20-, 26-, 43- and 51-Across) is simple. But notice how the idea is carried through in the black squares and the starts of the clues.
